entry.title: 海角七号
entry.content:
[海角七号]简介：

　　依傍大海的美丽小镇恒春上，音乐梦想在台北遭受打击的年轻人阿嘉（范逸臣）冷眼旁观着一切。虽在民代主席后父的帮忙下成了代班邮差，信件和邮包却被他乱堆在房间，而对一个寄自日本的无法送至的邮包，他也没按老邮差茂伯（林宗仁）的吩咐将之退回，而是私自拆阅查看：里面除一张泛黄的少女照片，是几封写于60年前的信件。其时日本在二战中战败，在台日籍教师（中孝介）随日军撤退时遗弃了相约私奔的女友，归日途中，他将爱意和悔意化为文字，但信件直到去世才被其女儿代为寄出。
　　在台湾留学、工作的日本女孩友子（田中千绘）有心成为模特，却被认为形象过时只能做负责日本超级“疗伤歌手”中孝介（中孝介）在恒春的演出事宜的公关。按惯例，中孝介演出之前会有乐团暖场，友子原本联络了日本某乐团，但民代坚持用本地乐团，友子无奈与包括阿嘉在内的几个年龄、工作、个性都有较大差异的当地音乐爱好者——因意外事件失掉幸福生活的交警（民雄）、暗恋老板娘的小店伙计水蛙（夹子小应）、早熟的小女生大大（麦子）等——成了工作搭档。由于阿嘉之外的几人全无舞台表演经验，临时组建的乐团时有矛盾发生，友子常被气得火冒三丈，最有经验的阿嘉气她最甚。
　　屡有调整的乐团成员——茂伯、兜售客家小米酒的马拉桑（马念先）先后取代贝斯手加入乐团，一直不顺的排练，中孝介来台的日子越来越近，对阿嘉彻底失望的友子决定放弃在台的工作回日本，但两人已在摩擦中生出感情。不久友子在阿嘉房间看到那些60年前的信件，完全被美丽的爱情故事打动，叮嘱阿嘉一定要将信件送至当事人手中。双方虽没开口表白，但爱情的力量无疑是巨大的，阿嘉因为友子重新拥有了追求音乐梦想的勇气。中孝介演出即将开始之时，信件主人的地址被找到，阿嘉也被友子告知她已接到日本唱片公司的工作邀约。

[译文]：
On the beauty of the sea town of Hengchun, music dream in Taipei were hit by young people, all sit on the sidelines (Fan Yichen). Although the people on behalf of the president of a help the class mail, letters and packages, but he huddle in the room, and for a mail from Japan to send to the parcel, he did not press the old postman Maobo (Lin Zongren) had to return, but secretly read: in addition to a view inside Zhang Fanhuang the girl is a few photos, written in letters 60 years ago. When Japan’s defeat in World War II, Japanese teachers in Taiwan (Atari Kousuke) with the Japanese retreat when the abandoned meet elopement girlfriend, by the way, he will love and remorse into words, but the letters until his death was the daughter to send.

entry.title: 第36个故事
entry.content:
[第36个故事]简介：

　　台北市的一角，伫立着一间清静雅致的咖啡店。它的主人朵儿（桂纶镁饰）和蔷儿（林辰唏饰）是一对美丽的姐妹花，朵儿经营咖啡店的想法由来已久，偶然的机缘下，她得以实现自己的梦想。虽然倾注了大量的心血，但是在开业之初的喧嚣后，咖啡店渐渐归于平寂。正当姐妹俩为此烦恼不已之时，一本朋友庆贺开业送的泰文食谱启发了鬼灵精蔷儿的灵感。她鼓励姐姐在咖啡店内开展以物易物的服务，吸引各色人等云集于此，寻找、交换彼此的心爱之物。咖啡店渐渐热闹起来，拥有36个城市故事的周群青（张翰饰）的到来，也改变着姐妹的人生……
　　本片荣获2010台北电影节观众票选奖和最佳音乐奖。

[译文]：
In the corner of Taipei stands a quiet and elegant coffee shop. Its owner bud (Lunmei Kwai ornaments) and Qiang son (Lin Chenxi) is the sister of a pair of beautiful flowers, bud Cafe idea long-standing, by chance, she realized his dream. Although devoted a lot of effort, but at the beginning of the uproar after the opening, coffee shops gradually attributed to silence. As the sisters nettled when a friend sent to celebrate opening Thai recipes inspired the Grinch Qiang son inspiration. She encouraged her sister to carry out in the coffee shop to barter services, to attract all kinds of people gathered here to find, exchange each other’s favorite objects. Coffee shop gradually lively, and has 36 City Stories of Zhou Qunqing (Zhang Han ornaments) arrival, also change the sisters life……

entry.title: 听说
entry.content:
[听说]简介：

　　阳光男孩黄天阔（彭于晏饰）的父母经营着一家便当店，某天，他在为听障游泳队送便当时邂逅了清纯美丽的姐妹花——小朋（陈妍希饰）和秧秧（陈意涵饰）。姐妹俩的父亲是一名传教士，常年在非洲工作。为了保障姐姐顺利参加听障奥运会，秧秧担负起赚取家用的重任。她每日来去匆匆，辛苦打着几份工。本身即掌握手语的天阔自然而然融入了姐妹俩的生活当中，为了接近心仪的秧秧，他时常在体育馆门口做生意，还费尽心思为秧秧制作爱心便当。相识时间虽短，却让两个年轻人的心越走越近。然而某次约会中，一个小小的误会阻断了他们的交往，与此同时，小朋也遭遇了一场灾难……

[译文]：
Sunshine boy yellow day wide (Eddie Peng ornaments) parents run a convenience store, one day, he was deaf swimming team sent at that time met pure beautiful sisters – Xiao Peng (Michelle Chen ornaments) and Yang Yang (Ivy Chen). The two sisters, a missionary, worked in Africa all year round. In order to ensure that her sister successfully participated in the hearing loss Olympic Games, the seedlings bear the responsibility of earning household. She came every day in a hurry and worked hard for several jobs. Master the sign language TianKuo itself naturally into the sisters’ life, in order to Yang Yang close to the right, he often do business at the entrance of the stadium, also tried to make lunch for Yang yang. Although the acquaintance time is short, but lets two young people’s heart go nearer and nearer. However, in a date, a small misunderstanding interrupted their contacts, while the little friend also suffered a disaster……

entry.title: 逆光飞翔
entry.content:
[逆光飞翔]简介：

　　音乐天分超凡的男孩裕翔（黄裕翔饰）弹得一手好琴，却天生失明。他坚持不参加任何比赛，只希望能拥有像普通人一样的生活。他第一次离家北上念书，遇见热爱跳舞却因故被迫放弃梦想的女孩小洁（张榕容饰）。裕翔能“看见”世界上不被旁人看见的美丽，从未放弃过这个世界。他就像一缕温暖的逆光照进了小洁冰冷的内心，而小洁则带领着裕翔经历了他从未尝试过的冒险。两个看似永不会相交的灵魂，却成为彼此遗失的那份力量。两人身后的那道耀眼的逆光，正温暖着、鼓舞着他们向梦想展翅飞翔。
　　本片改编自真人真事，男主人公黄裕翔本色演出。女主角则由台北电影节、亚太影展双料影后张榕容饰演，两人延续前作的绝佳默契，演绎了一段好友之间互相鼓励、勇敢逐梦的历程。导演张荣吉凭借此片荣获2012年第49届台湾电影金马奖最佳新导演奖，女主角张榕容荣获2012年第49届台湾电影金马奖最佳女主角提名，男主角黄裕翔荣获2013年第7届亚洲电影大奖最佳新演员提名。

[译文]：
A gifted boy, Yu Xiang (Huang Yuxiang) who plays a good piano, is born blind. He insists on not playing any games but wants to live like ordinary people. For the first time he left home to study in the north. He met a girl who loved dancing but was forced to give up his dream. (Xiao Jie, Rongrong Zhang). Yu Xiang can see “the world is not seen by others” of the beautiful, never gave up the world. He is like a ray of warm light shone into the small clean cold heart, and Xiao Jie Yu Xiang then led the adventure he never tried. Two souls that never seem to cross each other, become each other’s lost strength. Two people behind the dazzling light, is warm, encouraging them to dream of flying.

entry.title: 蓝色大门
entry.content:
[蓝色大门]简介：

　　高中生孟克柔（桂纶镁饰）与林月珍（梁淑慧饰）是无话不谈的好友，月珍告诉克柔，说自己喜欢上了一个叫张士豪（陈柏霖饰）的男生，便常常要求克柔帮她接近张士豪，帮忙认识他、帮忙传递情书。没想到张士豪以为喜欢自己的是孟克柔，所以也常常借故接近她，跟她在一起。传递情书的事，被张贴出来，原来林月珍是以孟克柔的名义给张士豪写信，孟克柔非常生气而从而跟林月珍的关系疏远了。另一边厢孟克柔极不愿意承认她与张士豪之间是恋人的关系，可是张士豪已深深喜欢上她。孟克柔想跟男生接吻，因为她想清楚一件事，原来她心里，喜欢的是另外一个人。

[译文]：
High school student Meng Kerou (Lunmei Kwai) and Lin Yuezhen (Liang Shuhui) is the good friend of Yuezhen, tell Rou, said his love of a man named Zhang Shihao (Berlin Chan ornaments) of the boys, they often asked Rou to help her close to Zhang Shihao, to help him, help spread love. Zhang Shihao did not think that their love is Meng Kerou, so often an excuse to close to her, with her. Love what is posted, Lin Yuezhen is the original name of Meng Kerou writing to Zhang Shihao, Meng Kerou was very angry with Lin Yuezhen and thus estranged. On the other side of the car Kerou Meng extremely reluctant to admit that she and Zhang Shihao is the relationship between the lovers, but Zhang Shihao has been deeply in love with her. Meng Kerou wants to kiss a guy because she wants to know one thing. She likes someone else.

entry.title: 雁南飞
entry.content:
[雁南飞]简介：

　　本部电影讲述身处硝烟弥漫的战争年代，一对热恋中男女青年的悲情爱情故事。薇罗尼卡（塔吉娅娜·萨莫依洛娃TatyanaSamojlova饰）和鲍里斯（阿勒克塞·巴塔洛夫AlekseyBatalov饰）本是沉浸在甜蜜热恋中的幸福情侣，可随着战争的爆发，这一切的美好即将破灭。鲍里斯参军，薇罗尼卡的父母在敌机的轰炸中双亡，悲痛欲绝的她只能寄宿在鲍里斯父亲的家中。鲍里斯的表弟趁机占有了她，薇罗尼卡受到众人指责。双重打击下的薇罗尼卡本想一死了之，可心中仍苦苦等待着鲍里斯的归来。当得知鲍里斯牺牲的消息后，薇罗尼卡彻底绝望了。战争结束，当所有人都在庆祝胜利的时候，薇罗尼卡也双手捧着鲜花来到广场上。这时，一行大雁在空中飞过，就像当初的美好时光一样。
　　本片一经问世，就轰动了整个世界影坛，以其绝美的光影对比，绝佳的镜头运用，一举荣获1958年戛纳国际电影节金棕榈奖和摄影大奖。

[译文]：
This film tells about the tragic love story of a passionate young man and woman in a time of war filled with smoke and smoke. Viv Ronnie C (Tatyana Samojlova TatyanaSamojlova) and Boris (SAM Alexis, bataalov AlekseyBatalov) this is immersed in the sweet love in the happy couple, but with the outbreak of the war, the beauty of it all is about to burst. Boris joined the army, Veronica’s parents in enemy bombing in died, distraught she only lodged in Boris’s father’s home. Boris’s cousin took the opportunity to take possession of her, and accuses veronica. Under the double blow Weronika wanted to die, but the heart still anxiously waiting for the return of Boris. When he learned that Boris died after the news, Veronica despair. The end of the war, when all the time in the victory, Veronica also hands holding the flowers to the square. At this time, a row of geese flying in the sky, just like the good times.

　　电车司机欧费善弹吉它，又有一副好歌喉。在狂欢节前夕，尤莉迪丝来看她的表妹，搭的是欧费的车，正好在表妹家中又听到欧费美妙的歌声，遂即产生了爱慕之情。欧费的未婚妻是一位善妒的女人，当他知道这件事后，就在狂欢节的舞会中与尤莉迪丝争吵起来。尤莉迪丝为了躲避这件事而伧促的逃入车库中，谁知欧费仍穷追不舍，欧费不经意将电源开关打开竟将尤莉迪丝活活电死。他抱着尤莉迪丝的尸体回到自已的小屋，不料被预藏在屋内的未婚妻及女巫们用石头打追杀而摔落崖下致死。

entry.title: 甜蜜的生活
entry.content:
[甜蜜的生活]简介：

　　马切罗（马塞洛•马斯楚安尼MarcelloMastroianni饰）是某杂志的专栏记者，他曾试图成为一名作家但是事与愿违，只得终日为明星绯闻奔忙。马切罗经常出席一些社会名流的交际酒会，于是他暗自和摄影师勾搭，设计拍摄明星隐私然后公诸于众。马切罗有一个女友元玛，在送她回家的途中，搭乘了一位妓院老鸨，后者对他讲述了很多风月场中的轶事，这让他对名利场更加厌恶。在基督教的某个仪式上，一位从美国来的名模总是对着媒体搔首弄姿，后来马切罗的批评家朋友斯泰纳一针见血指出了她的虚伪之处，这让他逐渐认清了上流社会的腐朽，并开始重新审视自己的生活。他发现自己并不热衷奢华的生活，而且对于那个自以为是的元玛也并不满意，并进行了我行我素的反抗……
　　本片获第13届戛纳电影节金棕榈奖。

[译文]：
Marcello (Marcello Ma Sichu Anne MarcelloMastroianni) is a magazine columnist, he tried to become a writer but it had all day long for celebrity gossip. Marcello often attend some celebrity communication reception, so he secretly and photographer seduce, shooting star and public privacy design. Marcellus has a girlfriend yuan Ma, on the way to her home, take a lot about a brothel, the latter in brothels field anecdotes about him, which makes him more distaste for vanity fair. In a Christian ceremony, a supermodel from the United States is always facing the media critic friend later giggle and flirt, Marcellus Steiner sharply pointed out her hypocrisy, let him gradually realize the social decay, and began to look at my life. He found himself not keen on the luxury of life, and was not satisfied with that smug horse, and went on his own way……

entry.title: 维莉蒂安娜
entry.content:
[维莉蒂安娜]简介：

　　长年在修女会中修行的维莉蒂安娜（SilviaPinal饰）即将立誓归宗，嬷嬷建议她在仪式前探望资助人叔叔海麦，维莉蒂安娜前往叔叔在乡间的大宅，岂料海麦因她酷似自己妻子而动情，维莉蒂安娜短暂停留后即将返回修女会，在动身的前夜，海麦央求她穿上了妻子的婚纱并向维莉蒂安娜求婚，被拒后指使女仆用药麻醉了她。第二天海麦自杀身亡，维莉蒂安娜返回大宅决定留下，海麦的私生子何塞（FranciscoRabal饰）携女友也来到大宅，马上雇人重整荒芜田地，同时维莉蒂安娜邀请一些流浪汉与病乞共享大宅，维莉蒂安娜照顾他们的生活，带领他们虔诚祷告，试图为他们提供神的帮助。何塞的女友大感失落宣布分手，趁维莉蒂安娜与何塞进城的功夫，病乞和流浪汉们登堂入室，将大宅搞得一团混乱。
　　本片是布努埃尔宗教三部曲的第二部，获1961年戛纳电影节金棕榈奖。

[译文]：
For many years in the convent in the practice of Velli Deanna (SilviaPinal) is a reformed, mother advised her to visit my uncle in the Huanghuaihai patron before the ceremony, Velli Deanna went to the uncle in the countryside house, unexpectedly the sea may she resembles his wife emotionally, Velli Christian will return after a short stay in the convent, started on the eve of the sea Maiyang begged her to put on his wife’s wedding and Velli Deanna to marry him, refused to instigate drugged her maid. Second days Dutch act Huanghuaihai died, Velli Deanna returned to the house decided to leave, the illegitimate child of Jose Hai wheat (FranciscoRabal) carrying his girlfriend came to the house, immediately hire reforming barren land, at the same time, Velli Deanna invited some tramps and beg a shared house, Vily Anna to take care of their life, they lead the devout prayer, trying to offer God help for them. Jose’s girlfriend, a sense of loss when Velli Deanna announced the break, and Jose to the city of Kung Fu, disease and begging homeless knowledge, will house a mess.

entry.title: 诺言
entry.content:
[诺言]简介：

　　主人公赛生活在巴西的穷乡僻壤，最值钱的家产就是一头驴。当他的驴子患重病时，他向上帝许愿，只要驴子能康复，他会像耶稣那样扛着十字架，一直从家乡到省府。后来驴子真的痊愈了，他便上路还愿。问题是，他最后把十字架给教堂时，教士听了他的理由后拒绝接受。原因是赛不该做这类似的宣誓许诺。赛却不肯死心，一直在教堂外面守候。这样一来，他成了新闻人物，惊动了主教。任凭主教的再三劝说，赛就是不肯放弃。当他的妻子与人通奸的丑闻而引起了一场暴动时，他却在混乱中丧生。赛死后，人们将他的尸体放在十字架上，了却了他生前的心愿。虽然本片获得了嘎纳大奖，但仍然是一部被人忽视的电影。有些影史专家还是给予了影片极高的历史地位。

[译文]：
The hero game live in Brazil’s remote villages, the most valuable possessions is a donkey. When the donkey his serious illness, he make a vow to God, as long as the donkey would recover, he would like Jesus has been carrying a cross, from home to the provincial government. Then the donkey really healed, he would hit the road. The problem is that when he finally gave the cross to the church, the priest refused to accept it after listening to his reasons. The reason is that the competition should not make such a pledge. The match refused to give up, and waited outside the church. In this way, he became a news man and alerted the bishop. Despite the Bishop’s repeated persuasion, the match refused to give up. He was killed in the confusion when his wife’s adultery scandal caused an uprising. After the match, people put his body on the cross and finished his wish. Although the film won the Cannes prize, it was still a neglected movie. Some history experts or to give a high position in the history of film.

entry.title: 豹
entry.content:
[豹]简介：

　　影片以1860年意大利的西西里岛为背景，通过萨里纳亲王这个中心人物的心路历程，反映出面对风起云涌崭新时代的到来，身处翻天覆地的社会变革的浩荡潮流当中，原有权贵和贵族因此而没落这一无奈而必然的命运。
　　萨利纳亲王一家原本过着平静的生活。但随着局势的急剧变化，亲王的外甥唐克雷迪投奔正在西西里登陆的青年意大利党人加里波军队。返回故里，唐克雷迪对市长塞达拉的女儿安杰莉卡一见钟情，两人情投意合，不久便订婚了。塞达拉答应给女儿一份丰富的嫁妆，这样便挽救了萨利纳即将衰败的家族，而塞达拉也因能跟大贵族攀亲而沾沾自喜。此后，西西里岛进行了全民投票，结果一致赞成归并意大利。都灵派来了使者，邀请萨利纳作为名门贵族的代表，参加议会工作，但被萨利纳拒绝了。新政府没有给这个沉睡了两千多年的岛屿带来任何变化，特别是加里波在战败后，巴勒莫上流社会的生活又恢复了旧貌，贵族们频频举行舞会，庆幸劫后余生。

[译文]：
The film is set in Italy in 1860 of the Sicily, through the journey of Prince Sarina, the central figure, reflecting the new era in the face of raging like a storm, in turn the world upside down the mighty tide of social change, the original bigwigs and thus the decline of aristocracy helpless and inevitable fate.

entry.title: 瑟堡的雨伞
entry.content:
[瑟堡的雨伞]简介：

　　17岁的少女Geneviève（凯瑟琳·德纳芙CatherineDeneuve饰）是法国瑟堡一家雨伞店老板娘的女儿；20岁的少年Guy（尼诺·卡斯泰尔诺沃NinoCastelnuovo饰）是一家汽车修理店的员工，和他的伯母和伯母的养女Madeleine(EllenFarner饰演)生活在一起。Geneviève和Guy是一对情侣，然而他们的恋情一直受到Geneviève母亲的阻挠。阿尔及利亚战争爆发了，Guy被迫要去前线服两年兵役。离别前一夜，两人发生了关系。分开的日子里，Geneviève很少收到Guy寄来的信，她开始怀疑他的真心。在母亲的撮合下，怀有身孕的她嫁给了一个一直对她穷追不舍的巴黎珠宝商RolandCassard(MarcMichel饰演)。两年后，服完兵役的Guy回到瑟堡，想要寻回他和Geneviève的爱情，却发现一切早已物是人非……
　　本片被提名37届奥斯卡最佳外语片、获1964年戛纳电影节“金棕榈”奖殊荣。本片所有的对白都是“唱”出来的，配乐也十分出色。

[译文]：
A 17 year old girl Genevi ve (Catherine Deneuve CatherineDeneuve) is France Cherbourg an umbrella shop owner’s daughter; 20 year old boy Guy (Nino Castall Nuovo NinoCastelnuovo) is an auto repair shop staff, and his aunt and aunt raised female Madeleine (EllenFarner) living together. Genevi ve and Guy are a couple, but their relationship has been Genevi VE’s mother block. When the war broke out in Algeria, Guy was forced to go to the front for two years’ military service. The night before parting, the two had a relationship. Separate days, the Genevi ve Guy rarely received a letter, she began to doubt his sincerity. In the mother’s match, pregnant she married a she has pursued a Paris jeweler RolandCassard (MarcMichel). After two years of military service, Guy returned to Cherbourg, want to return to him and Genevi ve love, but find that everything has changed……

entry.content:
[诀窍]简介：

　　托伦知道男孩追求女孩的诀窍。柯林处心积虑地想要学会它，乡下姑娘南西则心甘情愿受这套诀窍摆布。汤姆是热心古道的艺术家，也对这套诀窍感兴趣。男孩追求女孩的诀窍，说起来也没有什么神奇的地方，只要你福至心灵就能够心领神会，就能够水到渠成，心想事成，一切尽在不言中。
　　——————————————–
　　Colin的房客Tolen是一个玩弄女性的色情骗子。和Tolen相比，Colin总是和女人无缘，却渴望着性生活。他和另一个房客Tom出门去买张大床的时候遇到了Nancy，她在找基督教女青年会。他们去了Colin家。那里，她遇到了Tolen。Tolen用甜言蜜语引诱Nancy，搞得Colin非常嫉妒。Nancy因刺激晕倒，醒来后，发现被强奸了。Nancy指责Colin是罪犯……
　　本片根据女作家安·杰利科的剧作改变，但是与原作的故事和风格相去甚远，简直是面目全非。奇特的是，本片仍不失为一部佳片，处处洋溢着导演独有的、别具一格的讽刺和具有荒谬感的喜剧风格。本片的叙事精彩，情节有趣，一切的发展都是合情合理的；细腻地刻画了人物性格，生动的细节丰富了故事和人物。应该说，英国的喜剧在世界有着很高的水准。本片获得1965年第18届戛纳国际电影节大奖。

entry.title: 一个男人和一个女人
entry.content:
[一个男人和一个女人]简介：

　　她，AnneGauthier（阿努克·艾梅AnoukAimée饰）是一个寡妇，独自抚养着她的女儿。她是一名电影场记，丈夫是一个特技演员，在拍摄一场戏的时候不幸丧生。她每周都要从Paris去Deauville接送她在Deauville一所学校寄读的女儿。他，Jean-Louis（让-路易斯·特林提格南特Jean-LouisTrintignant饰）是一个鳏夫，独自抚养着他的儿子。他是一名赛车手，一场车祸后他的妻子以为他已经丧生而自杀身亡。他每周也要到Deauville去接送他的儿子。有一天，Anne送女儿上学后错过了回巴黎的最后一班火车，因此邂逅了Jean-Louis，Jean-Louis开车送Anne回家，两人约定下周一起去接孩子。下个周日，两人和两个孩子在一起度过了愉快的时光。两个寂寞的男女被彼此所吸引，爱情正在生根发芽。然而，Jean-Louis觉得这段爱情中有些奇怪，而对前夫的思念又让Anne纠结不已……
　　本片获1967年戛纳电影节金棕榈奖和1968年奥斯卡最佳外语片奖。

[译文]：
She, AnneGauthier (Anouk Aimee AnoukAim E) is a widow, raising her daughter alone. She is a movie script, the husband is a stunt actor in a drama shooting when killed. She every week from Paris to Deauville to take her to boarding a school in Deauville’s daughter. He, Jean-Louis (Jean Luis Katrin Teague Nantes Jean-LouisTrintignant) is a widower, his son alone. He was a race car driver, and his wife thought he’d been killed and killed himself after a car accident. He also goes to Deauville to pick up his son every week. One day, Anne sent her daughter to school and missed the last train back to Paris, so she met Jean-Louis, Jean-Louis drove Anne home, and the two agreed to pick up the children next Monday. Next Sunday, two people and two children had a good time together. Two lonely men and women are attracted to each other, love is taking root. However, Jean-Louis felt strange about this love, and the longing for her ex husband left Anne tangled……

entry.title: 放大
entry.content:
[放大]简介：

　　真相与幻想之间的界限是什么？感官是否能助我们认识世界？影片用一个摄影师的故事，铺开了一系列哲学、心理学的问号。
　　主角是摄影师托马斯(戴维·海明斯DavidHemmings饰)，某天他在公园里抓拍到年轻情侣的系列照片，出人意表的是，照片中的一个女子简(瓦妮莎·雷德格瑞夫VanessaRedgrave饰)竟然不惜一切代价要回她的底片。这让托马斯非常疑惑，他相信这张照片许是拍下了某些不可告人的秘密。果然，他把照片放大后，看到了一具尸体和一个拿着枪的人。
　　一桩谋杀案的雏形在托马斯脑中展开。他前往公园寻到了尸体，但没有人肯相信他的推测，朋友们不愿意和他一起调查这是怎么回事。第二天，当托马斯再次来到公园，发现尸体已经消失无踪。只剩下一群人进行着一场虚拟的网球赛，打着并不存在的的网球。

[译文]：
What is the line between truth and fantasy? Can the senses help us understand the world? Using a photographer’s story, the film rolled out a series of philosophical and psychological questions.

entry.title: 绅士现形记
entry.content:
[绅士现形记]简介：

　　本片用三个故事描写了意大利小镇生活。托尼为了勾引医生的老婆，假装自己是个大人物；一个银行职员鼓起勇气离开了凶悍的老婆，搬到情妇那里住，但不见容于社会，因此丢掉了饭碗；与此同时，镇上有一个少女行为出位，惹得男人们垂涎欲滴，直到她父亲透露她原来还未成年。影片用滑稽的效果生动一讽刺了意大利的小镇心态：自己可以偷鸡摸狗，但别人这么做就是大逆不道。

[译文]：
The film uses three stories to describe the life of a small town in Italy. The doctor’s wife to seduce Toni, pretending to be a great man; a bank clerk found the courage to leave his wife and mistress moved to live there, but no place in society, and therefore lost their jobs; at the same time, there is a girl behavior a bit Town, made men unable to hide greeds until her father said. She had a minor. The film with a comical effect vividly satire of the town of Italy state of mind: they can y’all, but others do so is treason and heresy.

entry.title: 幽情密使
entry.content:
[幽情密使]简介：

　　12岁的Leo应同学Marcus的邀请到他的家乡渡假。乡间的田原风光风景如画，Leo感到非常新鲜。他惊讶的是，Marcus的姐姐Marian貌美热情，她常带他去市场购物。Marcus出麻疹，不能陪Leo玩，Leo只好独自玩。他无意中来到黑色农场，农夫Ted让他带一封信给玛丽安，Leo非常高兴。他每给Marian送—次信，就能得到她感激的微笑。Leo很愉快充当送信的人。Leo与退伍兵HughTrimingham交上了朋友，Hugh常讲故事给听他。Leo发现Marian和Ted的信件是情书，并得知Maudsley夫人要把女儿嫁给Hugh时，就拒绝当送信的使者了。许多年过去了，Leo又来到Marcus家，Marian孀居在家，她还是那样漂亮热情。她再次要求Leo做送信人，给她的孙子送信。

[译文]：
Leo, 12, went to his hometown for vacation at the invitation of his classmate Marcus. The scenery of Tian Yuan in the countryside is picturesque and Leo feels very fresh. To his surprise, Marcus’s sister, Marian, was beautiful and enthusiastic. She used to take him shopping in the market. Marcus out of measles, can’t play with Leo, Leo had to play alone. He accidentally arrived at the black farm, and farmer Ted asked him to bring a letter to Marianne. Leo was very happy. Every time he sends a letter to Marian, he gets a grateful smile from her. Leo is happy to act as a messenger. Leo made friends with the veteran HughTrimingham, and Hugh often told stories to him. Leo found that Marian and Ted’s letters were love letters, and that when Mrs. Maudsley wanted to marry her daughter to Hugh, she refused to be a messenger. Many years later, Leo came to Marcus Marian, a widow at home, she was so beautiful passion. She once again asked Leo to be a messenger and deliver letters to her grandson.

entry.title: 工人阶级上天堂
entry.content:
[工人阶级上天堂]简介：

　　剧情：
　　30出头的工人马萨，工作热忱，受到老板的赏识，也正因如此，疏远了所有的工作同伴。一天他因为工伤而失去一个手指，一切随之改变。除他以外，所有工人都连成一气对付老板，他自己的生活已呈现崩溃状态，情妇离他而去，妻子离婚后带走儿子，自己又站错队伍，妄信支持大学生们空洞而不切实际的口号，结果遭到池鱼之殃，被老板解雇。集体罢工让工厂不能生产，工人们一面要求修改合约、提高待遇，一面也希望马萨能够复职。后来老板要求马萨在别人罢工期间回来工作，马萨答应，但当他回到工厂门前却无法面对聚集在那里的工人。他在羞愧之余，终于理解了工人们的坚定立场：在事件没有得到合理解决之前，决不妥协。
　　幕后制作：
　　本片获戛纳影展金棕榈奖。影片包含了许多社会现实元素，是一部有时代特征的政治电影，通过马萨这个“迷惘的工人”，再现了那个时代里人们陷入革命理想与现实困难的两难处境。整部电影延续了导演《查案记》的主题和风格，却将视觉转向了探索工人阶级的心态变化和心理活动。

[译文]：
Plot:

entry.title: 爱心补情天
entry.content:
[爱心补情天]简介：
